Inflation-fighting Fed likely to flag March interest rate hike
The policy decision, due to be released at 2 p.m. EST 
https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/inflation-fighting-fed-likely-flag-march-interest-rate-hike-2022-01-26/

links.title: Inflation-fighting Fed likely to flag March interest rate hike
links.description: The Federal Reserve is expected on Wednesday to signal plans to raise interest rates in March as it focuses on fighting inflation and sets aside, at least for now, economic risks posed by the ongoing coronavirus pandemic, a bout of market volatility, and Western fears of a Russian invasion of Ukraine.

links.title: Rohit Loomba on Adding Fenofibrate to Combo Therapy for Hypertriglyceridemia in NASH
links.description: Nonalcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH) is a leading cause of end-stage liver disease and liver transplant in the U.S. The pathogenesis of NASH is multifactorial and includes contributions from metabolic and other pro-inflammatory insults that promote fibrosis and disease progression. Targeting multiple relevant pathogenic mechanisms through combination treatment may provide optimal efficacy in NASH, particularly among patients with advanced fibrosis.

links.title: Google sued in US over 'deceptive' location tracking
links.description: It refers to dark patterns, design choices that alter users' decision-making for the designer's benefit - such as, complicated navigation menus, visual misdirection, confusing wording and repeated nudging towards a particular outcome.
